parameter.name: fullName
parameter.description: The full_name of the person (will split on space to set first and last name).

parameter.name: firstName
parameter.description: The first name of the person.

parameter.name: lastName
parameter.description: The last name of the person.

parameter.name: summary
parameter.description: Text summary description of the person.

parameter.name: companyId
parameter.description: The company id of the person.

parameter.name: companyName
parameter.description: The company name of the person (if changed, will find or create a company by that name).

parameter.name: userId
parameter.description: The user id of the person.

parameter.name: imageThumbnailUrl
parameter.description: A link to the person's avatar. Avatar is scaled to maximum of 50x50 pixels.

parameter.name: predefinedContactsTagIds
parameter.description: An array of tag ids this person is tagged with.

parameter.name: secondaryWorkAddress
parameter.description: Secondary work address of the person.

parameter.name: workPostalCode
parameter.description: Work postal code of the person.

parameter.name: secondaryHomeAddress
parameter.description: Secondary home address of the person.

parameter.name: homePostalCode
parameter.description: Home postal code of the person.

parameter.name: createdAt
parameter.description: Timestamp for when person was created.

parameter.name: updatedAt
parameter.description: Timestamp for when person was last updated.

parameter.name: unsubscribed
parameter.description: Whether or not the person is unsubscribed.

parameter.name: todoTemplateId
parameter.description: To apply a people-based todo template when creating the person.

parameter.name: todoTemplateUserId
parameter.description: To set the owner of any tasks created by applying the given todo template.
